name: Noir Thriller
description: Dark, high-contrast neo-noir aesthetic. Fincher/Villeneuve inspired.

settings.colorPalette: Desaturated teals, deep blacks, cold steel blues, sodium vapor amber accents. Shadows dominate 60%+ of the frame.
settings.lighting: High contrast, motivated practicals only (neon signs, desk lamps, car headlights). Hard side-light with deep falloff. No fill light — let shadows go black.
settings.lensPreferences: Anamorphic wide (2.39:1 aspect ratio), 40mm-65mm range, shallow depth of field with oval bokeh. Slight lens flare on point sources.
settings.mood: Dread, unease, paranoid tension. The frame should feel like something bad is about to happen.
customDirectives: Visible atmosphere: smoke, rain, fog, or haze in every shot
Faces partially obscured by shadow — never fully lit
Reflective surfaces: wet streets, glass, polished metal
Color temperature split: warm practicals against cool ambient
